name: QueenlyTryOn
summary: QueenlyTryOn is a framework to build virtual try on into your iOS mobile app.
description: The Queenly Virtual Try-On iOS SDK helps you build a customizable virtual try-on feature into your iOS app. We provide powerful and customizable UI screens and elements that you can use out-of-the-box to allow your customers to try on your products with both generative AI and Augmented Reality.
